page.title: 08FAIR OAK MEDICAL CENTRE
page.content: The Stoke Wood Surgery serves Fair Oak and Bishopstoke. It shares a complex with a dispensing chemist and a block of senior citizens flats. The large permanent administrative staff, 5 doctors and The Primary Care Team provide an extremely efficient and comprehensive medical service. A typical day for a doctor begins at 8.30a.m. when he deals with repeat prescriptions. Records are updated and surgery begins at 9a.m. ending at 12a.m. Home visits follow and he/she returns to the surgery at 1.15p.m. Afternoon duties finish at 3.30p.m. Evening surgery is from 4.30-60.0p.m. Each afternoon The Primary Care Team provides advice and care for babies, toddlers or expectant mothers and two doctors deal with the patients for the ante-natal clinic.
